players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he is the mafioso. We should vote him out to protect the town!"
Bob: "I am the detective. I investigated Diana last night and she is mafia. She is lying to frame me!"
You: "I'm not sure who the real detective is. We need to discuss more before voting."
Bob: "Alice, don't believe Diana. I am the real detective. Diana is mafia and lying to save herself. Vote for Diana!"
You: "Diana, why did you investigate Bob specifically last night? That might help us decide."
Diana: "I investigated Bob at random on the first night, as it's common to pick someone. My results confirm he's the mafioso. Don't believe his lies—vote him out to save us!"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
